headline.main: Beyond Our Shores, A Battle for Opinion

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''More and More, Other Countries See the War as Solely America's'' (news article, Nov. 4):
abstract: Michael Gewirtz letter declares that America will lead the way in world fight against terrorism, even without solid international support
snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''More and More, Other Countries See the War as Solely America's'' (news article, Nov. 4):...
